extendedInfo.description: *Free for PowerDVD 13 Ultra/Pro/Deluxe & 12 UltraPowerDVD Remote FREE by CyberLink turns your Android phone and tablet into a remote control for PowerDVD. You can also use PowerDVD Remote to wirelessly send, playback and save content from your smart device to your PC! If you like to connect your PC up to your TV so you can watch your movies on a bigger screen, then PowerDVD Remote lets you control everything from the comfort of your couch. Via Wi-Fi you have total control over your Blu-ray Discs, DVD titles and high-definition videos as well as the music and photo playback features in PowerDVD. FEATURES â¢ Turn your Android device into a remote controller for PowerDVDâ¢ Full navigation and playback control for Blu-ray Discs, DVD titles and videos â¢ Wirelessly play and save your smart deviceâs video and photos on PC â¢ Turn your smart device into a wireless keyboard and mouse pad for your PC â¢ Multi-touch control to remotely rotate and zoom-in photos Note: *Playback support and features vary between versions of PowerDVD. *The free version of PowerDVD Remote supports PowerDVD 13 Ultra/Pro/Deluxe & 12 Ultra. Users of PowerDVD 11 Standard and PowerDVD 12 Pro/Standard should download and install PowerDVD Remote paid version.

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: For some reason it does not recognize my server like it did before! I run ultra 12 & now it won\'t work! What to do What to do?

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work with RAZR M
reviews.comment: I installed it on my Motorola RAZR M, but when I try to run it, it says that it is not compatible with the screen resolution of my cell phone.  Great ??

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on droid razr m
reviews.comment: Get an error message right ad I try to open this app \"power DVD remote does not support the resolution of this device. Please check the requirement on the android market page.\"   I imagine this would be a great app, but I\'ve never been able to get the chance to find out.
reviews.author: Sam Lang

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: Have used this on a Droid X and an HTC Rezound, desktop and a laptop, no issues at all. This app is ONLY for the Ultra versions of PowerDVD. Other versions do not support it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but buggy
reviews.comment: Works brilliantly in that it has all the controls one needs and the ability to control the mouse pointer is a real plus. Only annoying thing is that it has this habit of locking up on my phone when I try to exit. No idea why.
reviews.author: James Allan

reviews.title: Used to work perfectly...
reviews.comment: Using on Samsung Galaxy S3 & did work perfectly, but since updating to Jelly Bean, it won\'t find servers
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works - on galaxy S II and ultra 12
reviews.comment: Works perfectly.   I have windows 8 and DVD ultra 12.  Everything connected almost instantly.   The Android controls the player perfectly, with no lag at all.     And this software gives you a free mouse app to boot, and it\'s very responsive.   Very impressed and would highly suggest.
reviews.author: Corey Harman

reviews.title: can not find server
reviews.comment: Tried everything.  Read through countless Poweredvd forums and still nothing.  The app does not even list my network.  My smart tv, 2nd pc in another room, ps3, tablet and cell phone all connected to my home wifi, however this app can not find anything.  Using Galaxy S Vibrant.
reviews.author: James Dewey

reviews.title: High Resolution Crash
reviews.comment: Fix to allow for higher resolution tablets. It won\'t run on my Asus TF700T with a 1920x1200 display. Seems that a multimedia company should make their apps work multimedia intended devices.
reviews.author: Aaron Schmidt
